pageContext.claim: “A lot of people are coming up for bad reasons too. We have a lot of very, very bad people with big criminal records trying to get through.”
pageContext.analysis: The is another case of Trump's hyperbole. With any large group of migrants there are bound to be a few bad apples, but in this case, many of people coming from Central America are fleeing crime and gang violence. Plus, of the more than 400,000 migrants apprehended by the U.S. Border Patrol in Fiscal 2018, roughly 20,000 had criminal records, many of which were for immigration violations. And only 800 were affiliated with a gang.
